4.7. test_object_access¶

4.7.1. Module d1_client.tests.test_object_access¶

This script exercises a node by retrieving the list of all objects and for each attempts to retrieve the associated metadata and the object.

Use with caution and care since it iterates over every object on the node.

Created:
Author:

DataONE (vieglais)
Dependencies:
  • python 2.6

Functions

readAll(f)
read_chunk(fobj[, chunk_size])
walkNode(target[, start]) Given a DataOne node, retrieve each object and it’s associated system
